description: gray outlined heart icon in the comment action bar, located between thumbs down and three-dot menu

metadata.thought: I need to locate the gray outlined heart icon within the comment action bar of each comment. Upon examining the screenshot, I can see that there are several comments displayed, each with its own set of interaction buttons. The heart icon is located between the thumbs down and three-dot menu icons for each comment. I will click on this heart icon to like the comment.
